subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Patrick Reed holed an 80-yard shot for eagle and made two birdies over his last four holes and beat Jimmy Walker in a playoff in the Hyundai Tournament of Champions in Kapalua, Hawaii.
snippet: Patrick Reed holed an 80-yard shot for eagle and made two birdies over his last four holes and beat Jimmy Walker in a playoff in the Hyundai Tournament of Champions in Kapalua, Hawaii.
